hero.title: Radio Hotel Serra Negra
hero.subtitle: Tradition, Elegance and Nature
hero.description: Discover a luxury retreat in the heart of Serra Negra, surrounded by lush nature and therapeutic radioactive waters.

slide1.title: Radio Hotel Serra Negra

slide1.description: Discover a luxury retreat in the heart of Serra Negra, surrounded by lush nature and therapeutic radioactive waters.

slide2.title: Therapeutic Radioactive Waters
slide2.subtitle: Wellness and Relaxation
slide2.description: Enjoy the unique benefits of Serra Negra's radioactive waters, known for their therapeutic and relaxing properties.

slide3.title: Lush Nature
slide3.subtitle: Waterfalls and Trails
slide3.description: Explore the natural beauties of the region, with crystal-clear waterfalls, ecological trails and a stunning view of Serra da Mantiqueira.

about.title: About Radio Hotel
about.subtitle: A Story of Tradition and Hospitality
about.description: For decades, Radio Hotel has been synonymous with elegance and tradition in Serra Negra. Located amidst lush nature, we offer a unique experience that combines classic charm with modern comfort.

accommodations.title: Our Accommodations
accommodations.subtitle: Comfort and Elegance in Every Detail

standard.name: Standard Room
standard.description: Comfortable accommodation with all essential amenities for a perfect stay.

superior.name: Superior Room
superior.description: More space and comfort, with privileged view of the hotel gardens.

deluxe.name: Deluxe Room
deluxe.description: Maximum comfort and elegance, with private balcony and nature view.

suite.name: Master Suite
suite.description: The most luxurious experience, with separate living room and premium amenities.

events.title: Special Events
events.subtitle: Unforgettable Moments in a Unique Setting

wedding.name: Weddings
wedding.description: Celebrate love in a romantic and unforgettable setting.

corporate.name: Corporate Events
corporate.description: Professional spaces for meetings, conferences and training.

facilities.subtitle: Everything for Your Comfort and Well-Being

pool.name: Heated Pool
pool.description: Relax in our heated pool with nature views.

spa.name: Spa & Wellness

restaurant.name: Restaurant

gym.name: Gym
gym.description: Stay active with modern equipment and panoramic views.

trails.name: Ecological Trails
trails.description: Explore nature on safe and well-marked trails.

waterfall.name: Private Waterfall
waterfall.description: Enjoy our private waterfall for unique moments.

restaurant.title: Restaurant

meta.title: Radio Hotel Serra Negra - Luxury Hotel in Serra Negra, SP
meta.description: Discover Radio Hotel, a retreat of elegance and tradition in the heart of Serra Negra, SP. Surrounded by lush nature, waterfalls and greenery, we offer a unique premium hospitality experience with therapeutic radioactive waters.
meta.keywords: serra negra hotel, luxury hotel sp, serra negra accommodation, radio hotel, farm hotel, serra negra tourism, nature hotel, corporate events, serra negra weddings, boutique hotel, radioactive waters, serra negra spa, hotel with pool, destination wedding, romantic hotel
